articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Welcome to Tidybiology. The goal of this endeaovour is to provide a "zero entry" introduction to R and data science to biologists.

articles.description: R and data science for biologists

## Useful Resources
R for Data Science
Exploratory Data Analysis & Visualization
dplyr guide
ggplot2 guide
From Data to Viz
10 Minute Markdown Tutorial
Past Projects
bespokeDS YouTube channel

The R and Tidyverse online communities are very active, helpful, and welcoming. One of the best ways to learn new things is to follow the #rstats hashtag on Twitter.

Acknowledgments
This website was modelled on a wonderful Distill website made by Alison Hill & Desirée De Leon
